episode.title: City of Eastlake v. Forest City Enterprises, Inc.

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion for the court to announce in 74-1563 the City of Eastlake against Forest City Enterprises, and for reason stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the Supreme Court of is reversed and the case is remanded for proceedings not inconsistent with this opinion.
Mr. Justice Powell has filed a dissenting opinion, Mr. Justice Stevens joined by Mr. Justice Brennan has filed a dissenting opinion.
